articles.title: Senior party and state officials pay homage to Kim Il Sung
Kim Jong Il's works published in Peru and Laos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's works published in Peru and Laos
     Pyongyang, October 11 (KCNA) -- The famous works of General Secretary Kim Jong Il "the Worker's Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" and "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation" were published in pamphlet respectively by the Fredi Publishing House in Lima, Peru and by the Lao State Publishing House.
